readable.title: 688940111_325a74674a
readable.content: A boy holding a cookie and wearing a red hat is looking at the camera . a boy in a red baseball cap eats a Ritz cracker and has a big pink cup of juice A little boy wearing a red hat with an Ritz cracker in his hand . A small boy with a red ball cap holding a cracker with a pink cup nearby . The small boy in the red hat has a cracker .
